category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_force_legacy_multisite
preference.preference_description: Enables the legacy binary payload for Multisite operations. Valid Values: *false: If set to false TcXML payload will be used for Multisite operations. This is the default value. *true: If set to true binary payload will be used for Multisite operations.
